Entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Actor, Static

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is what all other PCs and NPCs are based off of. Basic bounding boxes along with various size vars Created by Parzival on 4/20/2016.

    • Constructor Summary
